items.description: Graduated on time (GPA 8.35/10). Trained in systems analysis, data structures, algorithms, OOP, databases, and solving complex problems.
Training in repair, maintenance, and configuration of hardware, LAN/WAN networks, and technical support.
achievements: Full LAN network implementation as practical work

items.degree: Cisco CCNA - Networking Fundamentals for IP Networks
items.description: Comprehensive course in IP networking fundamentals and Cisco technologies, covering design, configuration, and troubleshooting of enterprise networks.
Advanced course in Mikrotik RouterOS router and switch configuration and administration. Hands-on experience managing complete multi-site network infrastructure with Mikrotik in production.
achievements: Real implementation of multi-site infrastructure with Mikrotik
Management of site-to-site VPN and advanced configurations in production

items.description: Professional certification in fiber optic technology by Furukawa Electric. Comprehensive training covering design, installation, testing, and maintenance of optical networks. Includes hands-on laboratory practices and multimedia content in single-mode (SMF) and multimode (MMF) fiber, connectorization, OTDR testing, fusion splicing, WDM multiplexing, optical splitters, and compliance with TIA-568.0 and TIA-568.3 standards for structured cabling systems.
achievements: 24 hours of intensive hands-on training with official Furukawa Electric materials
Laboratory practices with latest-generation Furukawa equipment
Certification in optical network design and loss budget calculations
Training in TIA-568.0 and TIA-568.3 standards compliance
Expertise in WDM (Wavelength Division Multiplexing) systems and optical splitters
